text: So I ask, God has not rejected his people, has he? Absolutely not! For I too am an Israelite, a descendant of Abraham, from the tribe of Benjamin.

<st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="683" class="">rejected</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> he <st data-num="4267" class="">foreknew</st>! Do you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">about</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>, <st data-num="5613">how</st> he <st data-num="1793" class="">pleads</st> with <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>?
“Lord, they have killed your prophets; they have demolished your altars; I alone am left, and they are seeking my life!”
But what was the divine response to him? “I have kept for myself 7,000 people who have not bent the knee to Baal.”
So in the same way at the present time there is a remnant chosen by grace.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> it is by <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st>, it is <st data-num="3765" class="">no longer</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st>, <st data-num="1893" class="">otherwise</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">would</st> <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st>? <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">failed</st> to <st data-num="2013" class="">obtain</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> it was <st data-num="1934">diligently seeking</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="1589" class="">elect</st> <st data-num="2013" class="">obtained</st> it. The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> were <st data-num="4456" class="">hardened</st>,

as it is written,

“God gave them a spirit of stupor,

eyes that would not see and ears that would not hear,

to this very day.”

And David says,

“Let their table become a snare and trap,

a stumbling block and a retribution for them;

let their eyes be darkened so that they may not see,

and make their backs bend continually.”
I ask then, they did not stumble into an irrevocable fall, did they? Absolutely not! But by their transgression salvation has come to the Gentiles, to make Israel jealous.
Now if their transgression means riches for the world and their defeat means riches for the Gentiles, how much more will their full restoration bring?
Now I am speaking to you Gentiles. Seeing that I am an apostle to the Gentiles, I magnify my ministry,

<st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="4458">somehow</st> I could <st data-num="3863" class="">provoke</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">people</st> to <st data-num="3863" class="">jealousy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="580" class="">rejection</st> is the <st data-num="2643" class="">reconciliation</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> will their <st data-num="4356" class="">acceptance</st> be <st data-num="1487 3361">but</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>?
If the first portion of the dough offered is holy, then the whole batch is holy, and if the root is holy, so too are the branches.
Now if some of the branches were broken off, and you, a wild olive shoot, were grafted in among them and participated in the richness of the olive root,

do <st data-num="3361">not</st> <st data-num="2620" class="">boast over</st> the <st data-num="2798" class="">branches</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2620" class="">boast</st>, remember that <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="941" class="">support</st> the <st data-num="4491" class="">root</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4491" class="">root</st> supports <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> you will <st data-num="3004">say</st>, “The <st data-num="2798" class="">branches</st> were <st data-num="1575">broken off</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="1473">I</st> could be <st data-num="1461">grafted in</st>.”

<st data-num="2573" class="">Granted</st>!<n id="1" /> They were <st data-num="1575">broken off</st> because of their <st data-num="570" class="">unbelief</st>, <st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> by <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>. Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5426">be</st> <st data-num="5308" class="">arrogant</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st>!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5339" class="">spare</st> the <st data-num="5449" class="">natural</st> <st data-num="2798" class="">branches</st>, <st data-num="3361 4458">perhaps</st> he will <st data-num="3761">not</st> <st data-num="5339" class="">spare</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1492" class="">Notice</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">therefore</st> the <st data-num="5544" class="">kindness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="663" class="">harshness</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>—<st data-num="663" class="">harshness</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">toward</st> those who have <st data-num="4098" class="">fallen</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5544" class="">kindness</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1437">provided</st> you <st data-num="1961" class="">continue</st> in his <st data-num="5544">kindness</st>;<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1893" class="">otherwise</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> will be <st data-num="1581">cut off</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2548" class="">even they</st>—<st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="2548" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1961" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1961" class="">continue</st> in their <st data-num="570" class="">unbelief</st>—will be <st data-num="1461" class="">grafted in</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="1461" class="">graft</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1461" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>.

For if you were cut off from what is by nature a wild olive tree, and grafted, contrary to nature, into a cultivated olive tree, how much more will these natural branches be grafted back into their own olive tree?

For I do not want you to be ignorant of this mystery, brothers and sisters, so that you may not be conceited: A partial hardening has happened to Israel until the full number of the Gentiles has come in.

And so all Israel will be saved, as it is written:

“The Deliverer will come out of Zion;

he will remove ungodliness from Jacob.

And this is my covenant with them,

when I take away their sins.”
In regard to the gospel they are enemies for your sake, but in regard to election they are dearly loved for the sake of the fathers.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="5486" class="">gifts</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2821" class="">call</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> are <st data-num="278" class="">irrevocable</st>.

<st data-num="5618">Just as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> were <st data-num="4218" class="">formerly</st> <st data-num="544" class="">disobedient</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1653" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="1653">received mercy</st> due to <st data-num="3778" class="">their</st> <st data-num="543" class="">disobedience</st>,

<st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="3778">they</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> have <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> been <st data-num="544" class="">disobedient</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">in order that</st>, by the <st data-num="1656" class="">mercy</st> shown to <st data-num="5212" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> may <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1653" class="">receive mercy</st>.
For God has consigned all people to disobedience so that he may show mercy to them all.
Oh, the depth of the riches and wisdom and knowledge of God! How unsearchable are his judgments and how unfathomable his ways!

For who has known the mind of the Lord,

or who has been his counselor?

Or who has first given to God

that God needs to repay him?
For from him and through him and to him are all things. To him be glory forever! Amen.
